Sentencas: The impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells was modelled by three-dimensional impedance networks.
Titulo: Calculations of impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These networks were generated by identifying neighbours in computer-generated random packings of electrode and electrolyte particles.
Titulo: Calculations of impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The impedance of the networks was then calculated from Kirchhoff's current law, assuming for the impedance of a single electrode-electrolyte interface the impedance of a generic three-step reaction pattern.
Titulo: Calculations of impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The shape of the impedance-plane plot for the composite will, in general, differ significantly from that of the single electrode-electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Calculations of impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These differences appear as a distortion of the spectrum at high frequencies, in some cases even as clearly distinguishable extra arcs.
Titulo: Calculations of impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The nature and strength of the distortions will depend on the volume fraction of electrode particles, impedance parameters, conductivities and geometrical factors.
Titulo: Calculations of impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results are explained by the presence of electrode-particle clusters entirely confined within electrolyte clusters.
Titulo: Calculations of impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Since the interfacial impedance of the former occurs partly in parallel with the ohmic resistance of the latter, additional time constants may appear in the impedance of the composite.
Titulo: Calculations of impedance of composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells
